Class DashVodRendererBuilder.V18Compat

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.google.android.libraries.mediaframework.exoplayerextensions.DashVodRendererBuilder.V18Compat
  • Enclosing class:
    DashVodRendererBuilder

    private static class DashVodRendererBuilder.V18Compat
extends java.lang.Object
    Adds compatibility for API level 18.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static getDrmSessionManagerData(ExoplayerWrapper player, com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.MediaDrmCallback drmCallback)
      Return a pair where the first element is the DRM session manager and the second element is whether the security level is 1.
      private static int getWidevineSecurityLevel(com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.StreamingDrmSessionManager sessionManager)
      Reads the security level string from the session manager and returns the appropriate constant - one of DashVodRendererBuilder.SECURITY_LEVEL_1, DashVodRendererBuilder.SECURITY_LEVEL_3, or DashVodRendererBuilder.SECURITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN.

    • Method Detail

      • getDrmSessionManagerData

        public static  getDrmSessionManagerData(ExoplayerWrapper player,
                             com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.MediaDrmCallback drmCallback)
                                      throws UnsupportedSchemeException
        Return a pair where the first element is the DRM session manager and the second element is whether the security level is 1.
        Parameters:
        player - The ExoplayerWrapper which will receive this renderer builder and use it to play the video.
        drmCallback - Performs android.media.MediaDrm key and provisioning requests.
        Throws:
        UnsupportedSchemeException

      • getWidevineSecurityLevel

        private static int getWidevineSecurityLevel(com.google.android.exoplayer.drm.StreamingDrmSessionManager sessionManager)
        Reads the security level string from the session manager and returns the appropriate constant - one of DashVodRendererBuilder.SECURITY_LEVEL_1, DashVodRendererBuilder.SECURITY_LEVEL_3, or DashVodRendererBuilder.SECURITY_LEVEL_UNKNOWN.
        Parameters:
        sessionManager - Manages the DRM session.
